backend/main.mo: Defines the actor’s data models for users, posts, stories, messages, notifications, support issues, follow graph, and includes authorization and blob‑storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files, components, and tests for a build‑retry and deployment‑fix feature.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend files describing styles, components, navigation, and auth flows.
frontend/index.css: Defines global CSS variables, light/dark theme tokens, and Tailwind base styling overrides.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React Query, TanStack Router routes, auth guards, role checks, and an error fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/admin/FeatureFla: Admin UI for viewing and updating feature flags with loading, error, and save handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/PostModera: Displays all posts for admins with author info, thumbnails, timestamps, and allows deleting posts.
frontend/src/components/admin/SupportIss: Shows user-submitted support issues with metadata and lets admins update each issue’s status.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserModera: Provides admin tools to search users and manage verification, blocking, and role promotion/demotion.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the main app layout with header, routed content, mobile tab bar, and footer.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Simple login screen allowing users to sign in via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Gatekeeper component that handles authentication, profile loading, timeouts, and forces setup when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Restricts access based on admin or officer roles and shows appropriate error or redirect options.
Renders horizontal list of active user stories with avatars, loading skeletons, and viewer integration.
frontend/src/components/IdeaList.tsx: Placeholder component showing a stub message for future idea listing.
frontend/src/components/IdeaSubmissionFo: Placeholder component showing a stub form message for future idea submissions.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageHeade: Reusable layout header showing a page title, optional description, and optional action buttons.
frontend/src/components/nav/HeaderNav.ts: Top navigation header with links, notifications badge, profile avatar, and conditional moderation link based on user roles.
frontend/src/components/nav/MobileTabBar: Mobile bottom navigation bar with main app routes, profile navigation logic, and optional moderation tab.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Displays a single post with author info, image loading states, interactions, and optional delete functionality.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostGrid.t: Renders a grid of posts with image loading states and click-through navigation to individual posts.
frontend/src/components/profile/EditProf: Dialog for editing profile details with form validation, update mutation, and success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/FollowBu: Follow/unfollow button handling state, pending requests, and mutations with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/profile/FollowRe: Panel listing incoming follow requests with approve/deny actions and requester profile info.
frontend/src/components/profile/Highligh: Renders a horizontal scroll area with a button to add a new highlight and placeholder highlight items.
frontend/src/components/profile/MediaCon: Displays feature flag switches for filters and music, handling loading, errors, and updates.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileA: Shows a profile avatar image with size options and a fallback default image.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Provides a form for creating a user profile with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/SuperAdm: Allows super admins to grant or remove blue verification badges for a user.
frontend/src/components/profile/Verified: Displays an SVG verification badge in different color variants.
frontend/src/components/stories/CreateSt: Dialog for creating a story by uploading an image with validation, preview, and submission.
frontend/src/components/stories/StoryVie: Shows a full-screen story viewer with author info, image display, and like/unlike actions.
frontend/src/constants/superAdmin.ts: Defines the super-admin principal and helper to check if a principal is super-admin.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on authentication state, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorInitTimeout.t: Tracks whether actor initialization exceeds 15 seconds by monitoring isFetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminModeration.ts: Provides a mutation to update a user's verification state and invalidates related profile queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppIdeas.ts: Placeholder hooks returning static data and errors for unimplemented app-idea features.
Wraps toast notifications to show formatted backend errors or success messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerRole.ts: Fetches the caller's effective role based on identity, actor, and backend user role.
frontend/src/hooks/useFeatureFlags.ts: Gets and updates feature flags via actor calls with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useFollowRequests.ts: Stub hooks for follow-request features, currently returning empty data and throwing unimplemented errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth lifecycle, exposing identity, login, logout, and status via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessages.ts: Defines messaging hooks that depend on missing backend methods and currently throw errors or return empty results.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Stub notification hooks returning empty data and throwing errors due to missing backend support.
frontend/src/hooks/usePostImageSrc.ts: Converts ExternalBlob images into safe display URLs with validation, fallback, and cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/usePosts.ts: Provides post-related queries and mutations such as fetching feeds, user posts, and creating posts via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfiles.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile data, with several mutations stubbed due to missing backend methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useSocialGraph.ts: Implements hooks for follower/following operations, but all backend calls are placeholders that throw errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useStories.ts: Contains hooks for story retrieval, creation, and likes, integrating with backend story APIs and invalidating queries on updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupport.ts: Offers hooks for submitting, retrieving, and updating support issues using backend support APIs.
frontend/src/hooks/useThemePreference.ts: Manages light/dark theme preference using localStorage and synchronizes theme changes across tabs.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserModerationActi: Provides hooks for user moderation actions like blocking, unblocking, and role changes, invalidating related queries after mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, gradients, animations, and admin styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPortalPage.tsx: Renders an admin portal with tabs for user moderation, post moderation, feature flags, and support issues. Provides a styled layout with tabbed navigation displaying the respective panels.
frontend/src/pages/ConversationPage.tsx: Handles viewing and sending messages in a conversation, including initializing conversations, loading messages, error handling, and auto-scrolling. Uses profile lookup, message hooks, and renders a chat UI.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Provides a form to create a post with caption and optional image upload, including validation, previews, and blocked-user restrictions. Submits new posts through a createPost hook and handles errors.
frontend/src/pages/ExplorePage.tsx: Implements a search interface for finding users and displays recent posts. Fetches user profiles and post data and renders results with navigation to profiles.
frontend/src/pages/FollowersFollowingPag: Displays either followers or following for a given user, handling loading, errors, and navigation to user profiles. Fetches the appropriate list based on route parameters.
frontend/src/pages/HomeFeedPage.tsx: Shows the user’s home feed with stories, posts, and error/loading states. Uses the home feed hook to fetch posts and supports retry on failure.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesPage.tsx: Renders the conversations list with loading/empty states and navigates to individual message threads.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Displays notifications, unread counts, follow requests, and supports marking items as read with error handling.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Shows a single post with author info, image, comments, and supports adding new comments.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays a user's profile, posts, follower data, and provides messaging, follow, and edit options.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides appearance settings, logout functionality, and account/support options.
frontend/src/pages/SupportPage.tsx: Lets users submit categorized support requests with validation and success/error feedback.
frontend/src/types/backend-actor-augment: Augments the backend actor type with a method for initializing access control using an admin secret.
frontend/src/types/missing-backend-types: Defines TypeScript placeholders for backend types plus interfaces for comments, follow requests, notifications, conversations, and messages.
frontend/src/utils/formatBackendError.ts: Maps various backend, network, and initialization error messages to user-friendly English strings.
frontend/src/utils/postImage.ts: Provides helpers to convert binary image data to blob URLs, revoke them, and convert File objects to Uint8Array.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Extracts query-string parameters from the browser URL for setup or secret values.
frontend/src/utils/verifiedBadge.ts: Determines which verification badge color to show based on user role and verification state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, breakpoints, shadows, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes the current project state, requirements, architecture notes, and unresolved issues for the Instabook app.
